reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The front of house service was polite and well mannered with a better than expected grasp of customer service. Walking to the room was further than expected as I was unaware of the number of rooms but all was well signposted so there was no difficulty in finding my wat to the various ammentities.The rooms were clean and well presented. The noise from the street was hardly heard and this made for a good night sleep even though tne hotel is situated on a corner location. ease of access to the beach was aslo an added ferture if that is what you are seeing. Meals were a reanable price with a good selection. All in al agreat stay.
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel In Paradise

reviews.text: My partner and I just returned from a 10 day stay at the Pullman and were completely satisfied with the hotel complex, from our spacious room to the infinity pool and the hotels perfect location. The street to the left of the hotel had the best shopping in legian and some amazing restaurants :) far enough away from the hustle of kuta and still right on the beach!
reviews.title: Avoid - Not a pleasant stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel restaurant was pricey but plenty of restaurants outside to choose from.
reviews.title: Great Location & Great Hotel
High rise on the beach?
reviews.text: If you are looking for a Balinese style resort with beautiful gardens and a relaxed feel don't come to this hotel. The floor in our room creaked so badly that we woke each other up if we had to get up in the middle of the night. The location is great - right on the beach - but we could have been in a hotel in any big city. The rooms were located in several five story towers which looked into one and other! The two pools (one on the roof with an infinity edge) were not big enough to service a full complement of guests. Staff were friendly and the hotel was clean but the atmosphere was totally lacking. We moved after a couple of days to a low rise resort up the road with beautiful gardens and a pool that went on forever. Very disappointing and we wouldn't stay here again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After reading all the mixed reviews I was unsure that my decision to stay here was the right one, however a friend had stayed here and raved about it. As soon as we arrived we had a great experience with clean rooms and friendly service. The infinity pool is beautiful and really romantic. The location is great with kuta in walking distance and everything you need surrounding you, taxis are so cheap anyway if you need to get to seminyak and other areas. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again. Would also recommend the beach lounge just down the main road towards Kuta for breakfast as service is fantastic and was a regular spot for us.
reviews.title: Amazing hotel

reviews.text: First mention would have to go to the staff. What terrific staff. Its just really nice to see genuine smiles, people who look happy to be at work and very attentive.
reviews.title: Fantastic Location, Special Mention for the wonderful staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Pullman is located just outside the entrance to legian beach. Having now stayed at 4 newly built Pullman,s I can say that this Pullman has their strengths and weaknesses. It does provide reasonably good value for money at this level. We got a deal of 121$ a night with breakfast. The problems are that these hotels seem to be built at a price to simulate luxury. The halls are not carpeted, and the doors not thick enough to stop the echoing of people using them. This is an annoyance. The wooden floor is lifting a little in our room so it squeaks when you walk on it. The facilities are all there, nice spa, restaurant and two pools. However, they are more of a business hotel than those of a beach resort. The pools are ok if there is not a high occupancy as both are small. The roof pool is the better of the two. The sun longes are excellent. We found service to be pleasant and helpful at all times. The restaurant is just ok. The buffet was very average though the accompanying dancers and musicians were fun and very good! The restaurant needs to improve. breakfast buffet was better but changes little day to day. One oddity is that many of the rooms near the garden pool are unfinished, as are many others. This is after the hotel has been open for a year or so.
reviews.title: A good hotel option in kuta

aka: Pullman Bali Legian Nirwana Hotel Legian
description: The most popular beach front in Bali welcomes a prestigious new addition. Set in tranquil surroundings opposite the famous Legian Beach. Pullman Bali Legian Nirwana is the newest 5-star hotel in Kuta. Close to the airport, this hotel offers easy access to restaurants, shopping and nightlife. Its 353 impeccable rooms and suites feature modern design inspired by the frangipani tree, and Pullman Bali Legian Nirwana boast superior leisure facilities for a truly sophisticated resort experience.
